sources.title: Silvery Moon (1933)
sources.description: As two feline sweethearts sail along Moonlight Bay, the moon invites them up for a visit. They discover the moon is not made of green cheese, as is rumored, but is actually a land of candy, ice cream and cake. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/silvery-moon-1933/

metadata.Plot: A couple is rowing a canoe when the moon calls out to them. They climb a stairway to it and find a world of candy, featuring the Peppermint Candy Palace. They gorge themselves, then find themselves chased by castor oil and a spoon back to Earth.
